Articles.Content:
Hi:

I purchased KSP and I'm really enjoying it. But I missed a launcher to have it available from my applications menu, so I created a little installer for Linux. It creates an icon in the applications menu for KSP, without needing root priviledges.

You can download it from http://www.rastersoft.com/blogpic/ksp_installer.tar.bz2. To use it, just uncompress it in the game directory and run ksp_installer. It will create a launcher, and take into account to use LC_ALL=C when launching KSP.
